mapper.insert: insert into rc_order_delivery (ORDER_ID, TRACKING_NUMBER, LOGISTICS_COMPANY, DELIVERY_TYPE, DELIVERY_TIME, DISPATCHER_MOBILE, DISPATCHER_NAME) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trackingNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticsCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dispatcherMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispatcherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update rc_order_delivery
TRACKING_NUMBER = #{trackingNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGISTICS_COMPANY = #{logisticsCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVERY_TYPE = #{deliveryType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELIVERY_TIME = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DISPATCHER_MOBILE = #{dispatcherMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISPATCHER_NAME = #{dispatcherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ORDER_ID, TRACKING_NUMBER, LOGISTICS_COMPANY, DELIVERY_TYPE, DELIVERY_TIME, DISPATCHER_MOBILE, DISPATCHER_NAME from rc_order_delivery where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
